Events

Here we will update you on our upcoming events, from workshops to fundraisers to clothing drives, because the future of our community depends on what we do today.

If you want to volunteer or sponsor us, feel free to contact us.

Jay’s Food Drive

Jay is holding a food drive for his Eagle Scout project, and is collecting any non-perishable food items. The food must be in original packaging to ensure that recipients can know allergen and other dietary information.

Learn More

Ally’s Furniture Drive

Ally is holding a furniture drive in her neighborhood, and is collecting any furniture items that would be useful to parents. As per our donation guidelines, we ask that everything donated be in good enough condition to not require repairs.

Learn More

Annual Auction

To help further fund our many projects, we are holding an auction. Local artisans are donating excess materials which can be sold to our bidders. More information to follow.

Learn More

Foundation Review

Our board members will be meeting with the community to discuss ways that we can improve our outreach and to find other ways to improve our programs. It will be available to participate in both in-person and via online stream. More details to follow.

Learn More
